description: Filters for search. Fields are combined using the **AND** logic. Numeric range fields (`_from` and `_to`) allow specifying minimum and maximum values. List fields (`_contain` and `_not_contain`) specify inclusion or exclusion criteria

url_prefix.description: Filters results to URLs that start with the given prefix.

url_contain.description: Filters results to URLs that contain the specified substring.

url_not_contain.description: Excludes results with URLs that contain the specified substring.
